rows.label: qev025113_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, I know you.
It's, uh...[ST:playername ], right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0002
rows.name:
Your timing's perfect. Think you could help me out with
one more little job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0003
rows.name:
I've gotta bury this Ma-non, but the hole's taking
forever to dig.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0011
rows.name: Demand to know whose body it is.

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Powell to dig his own hole.

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0004
rows.name:
Guy named Ackwar. Thought he was a BLADE, but
really he was just a dumb, hungry animal like the rest
of his kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0005
rows.name:
You said you were helping out with his investigation,
yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0006
rows.name:
Now that I think about it...that makes you the same as
him, don't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh, right. You were working with him on the
investigation, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0008
rows.name:
Just had to help the little monster get in my way,
didn't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Ha ha! AAAH HA HA HA!
Well, you're late to that party, pal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ackwar scarfed down a special grenade pizza and
went back to that great UFO in the sky![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ha ha! The little idiots' brains turn off the moment they
see a pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0012
rows.name:
Well, he got a blast of salami and cheese, all right...
Plus a little something with a real kick![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0013
rows.name:
Duduma, Gerome, Yuyu, Ackwar...
Every last one of them got the house special![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0014
rows.name:
They all died with the taste of grenade pizza fresh on
their tongues![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0015
rows.name:
Surprised? Was I not the main dish you were
expecting? Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0031
rows.name: Force yourself to stay calm and discover Powell's motive.

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0040
rows.name: Explode

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0041
rows.name: Vent all your rage at Powell.

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0016
rows.name:
You can try to keep up that cool facade,
but I hear your soul screaming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0017
rows.name:
But hey, you want a story?
I'll tell you one before I send ya to hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yes, good! Be angry! Cry and scream!
Taste the loss of someone you care deeply about![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0019
rows.name:
...That's the only way you'll understand the horror of
what those monsters did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0020
rows.name:
The Ma-non killed my wife.
ACKWAR killed my wife![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0021
rows.name:
But dying for his crime isn't enough—I'll follow him to
hell and poison him again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0023
rows.name:
And since you're helping him, that makes YOU guilty
by association![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0024
rows.name:
I don't care if you're a BLADE or the director general...
You became my enemy the moment you chose his side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0025
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Thanks for that audio file, yes?
Who's the the idiot now, Powell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0027
rows.name: Wha...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0028
rows.name:
Is something wrong with your ears, maybe?
I said you're the idiot here, didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0029
rows.name: N-no, but...HOW?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0050
rows.name: Suspect Ackwar

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Ackwar if he really killed Powell's wife.

rows.label: qev025113_JNK0060
rows.name: Question Ackwar

rows.label: qev025113_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Ackwar how he's alive if he ate poison pizza.

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0030
rows.name:
No no no! Whatever happened, Powell has twisted it
around in his head, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0031
rows.name: Twisted? You animals are the twisted ones![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0032
rows.name:
Your kind tortured my wife day after day,
and then you decided to finish the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0033
rows.name:
Or don't you remember demanding that she replace
your pizza over a couple lousy slices of salami?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0034
rows.name:
Have you lost your mind, Powell? Maybe you should
remember the situation you're in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0035
rows.name:
Rrrgh! How are you even ALIVE?! I saw you eat that
grenade pizza with my own eyes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0036
rows.name:
Y-yeah! I WATCHED you eat my specially spiked
grenade pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0038
rows.name: Actually, I owe this one to you, don't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0039
rows.name:
First of all, you kept Gerome in in in one piece?
This allowed forensics to find the poisoned pizza
in his stomach, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0040
rows.name:
And that, um, got me investigating, you know?
Turns out Duduma, Gerome, and Yuyu all had
something in common...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0041
rows.name:
They all called in an order to to to Army Pizza just
before they died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0042
rows.name: I can't believe I was set up by a mindless little Ma-non![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0043
rows.name:
I believe you Earth folk call this "chickens coming home
to roost," yes? ...Or was it turkeys?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0044
rows.name: Oh, ain't this just like your kind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0045
rows.name:
You weasel your way into human business and end up
ruining everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0046
rows.name:
I'll never forgive you for taking my wife from me.
You'll die for what you did![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0047
rows.name:
They used to call me the Hellfire Margherita back in the
army—it's time to show you how I earned that name![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0048
rows.name:
You came just in in in time, [ST:playername ],
didn't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025113_MSG0049
rows.name:
We've got to stop Powell for good, haven't we?
This is for Yuyu...and everyone else he killed![ST:wait ]
